creator: rick@svgz.org
text:
- uname -a : Linux tigger.svgz.org 2.6.9-1.6_FC2 #1 Thu Nov 18 22:03:19 EST 2004
i686 i686 i386 GNU/Linux
- Batik-1_5beta2
- Gnome desktop
1: load image
2: expand batik to entire desktop
3: reload image
- The view window resizes to fit the original image size but the application
frame remains expanded and old enlarged image fills remaining space.
Enjoy:)
Rick.

Reassigning all open bugs to the development list.
Sorry for the mass mailing.
